opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: McConnell United States Senator v. Federal Election Commission

opinion:
539 U.S. 979

McConnell, United States Senator, et al.
v.
Federal Election Commission et al.

No. 02-1674.

Supreme Court of United States.

August 19, 2003.

1

Motion of the National Rifle Association and the Paul plaintiffs for reconsideration of the August 4, 2003, order [ante, p. 974] concerning divided argument denied.
